title: Customizing Matplotlib Visualizations in Python
description: In this lab, we will learn how to use Matplotlib to create visualizations in Python. Matplotlib is a powerful library for data visualization and is commonly used to create plots, charts, and graphs. We will explore the different types of plots available in Matplotlib and learn how to customize them to create professional-looking visualizations.
